700851f-a.title: Bronx: Decatur Avenue - 197th Street (East)
700851f-a.text:
(1)
Decatur Avenue, south of, adjoining, and at the S.W. corner
of E. 197th Street. The two frame houses bear numbers 2737 and
2739, and the 5-story building bears No. 364 E. 197th Atreet.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
Looking westward across the empty lot (lot 41) seen on the
left in view 1. In the background appears the east wing and
rear of a 6-story house bearing No. 2728 Marmion Avenue.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700311f-a.title: Bronx: 197th Street (East) - Decatur Avenue
700311f-a.text:
381 and 385 E. 197th Street, at, and adjoining the N.E. corner
of Decatur Avenue, showing two boarded-up frame houses.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
